title: U.S. DEPARTMENT OF AGRICULTURE
directions: Wash hands with soap and water.
Pico de gallo: In a bowl, mix all the ingredients. Season to taste with salt and pepper.
Seasoning: In a small bowl, mix the paprika, onion powder, garlic powder, salt and pepper.
Remove the silver skin from the pork tenderloin, rub it with oil and coat the entire loin with the seasoning.

Place the pork tenderloin on the grill at medium/high heat (400˚F), over indirect heat, for approximately 6 minutes on each side, 18 minutes total. https://www.myplate.gov/recipes/roasted-pork-tacos-pico-de-gallo 2/6
source: Roasted Pork Tacos with Pico de Gallo _ MyPlate.pdf
